job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrong Basic Salary 185K  Performance based bonusstrongppbrppOur client is a quant driven hedge fund and is looking to hire an exceptional Python Engineer to its crossasset trading teamppbrppAs a Python expert you will be responsible for enhancing and or building all aspects of the teams automated trading research data and risk management system that leverages Python code This is a comprehensive role where you will work on a variety of short long term and missioncritical problemsppbrppIn 23 years time depending on your interests the opportunity to move into a full time research trading role exists In fact this opening is the result of a successful transitionppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongppbrppgt STEM undergraduate  graduate degrees from a leading schoolppgt Expert programming skills in Pythonppgt 4  years work experience as a software engineer  data scientist from any industryppgt Interest in working on statistics probability and machine learning based projectsnbspppbrppstronguPlease apply via this postingustrongppbrppstrongPlease Note We are a niche recruitment firm specializing in the quantitative trading and Fintech Industry We have been retained by our client to identify interview and introduce suitable candidates for this positionnbspnbspnbspstrongp
